text:
José María Hurtado Ruiz-Tagle (5 March 1945 – 24 September 2018) was a Chilean politician. He was born in Santiago de Chile. He was a member of the National Renewal (RN) party and a member of the Chamber of Deputies of Chile between 1990 and 1998.
Hurtado Ruiz-Tagle died on 24 September 2018 in Santiago, aged 73.
